Articles.Content:
Hi , I'm Kalaghan and I'm discovering the universe of KSP since one month.. and it's fantastic, I really love this game and all those interesting mods. I can't only have a stable version with mods on linux with x64 version. 

Does someone use Wine on linux , It appears that it improve perfs. anyone can confirm this please ?

K.
Hello Kalaghan. I don't use Linux, but someone who does will be along shortly. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Welcome to the forums! I use Linux and 64-bit is a godsend, but I don't really know what Wine is. If I did I would be helping you right now.

Hi and sorry for being late. I don't use wine, I use direclty the KSP 64 Linux compil. It's amazing, I can play RSS with EVE or New Horizons and Kerbal Galaxy, with Max Resolution and quality. it's pure dope
